about_the_game:
This game is a light walking simulator, there are no riddles, there is only plot, atmosphere and the power of the earth.

and the Saga Began...

Game Features:

- Genre “Walking Simulator”;
- Gameplay is close to realism;
- Locations in dark colors (So planned, don't go into the dark)
- No notes
- No riddles
- There is an atmosphere
- There is a plot
- The game contains local jokes, not everyone will understand them

Band music: Make me insane

WARNING:

This video game may trigger an attack of photosensitive epilepsy in people susceptible to this disease. A reasonable limit on the gaming audience is recommended.

DESCRIPTION OF ADULT CONTENT:

The game contains images of violent scenes that may have a negative impact on the psyche. Please also be aware that the game contains scenes of alcohol or drug use.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains images of violent scenes that may have a negative impact on the psyche. Please also be aware that the game contains scenes of alcohol or drug use.

name: Heirs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Inheritance can be different, and it is not always pleasant, right?
